00018 namespace lsf {
00019 namespace util {
00020 
00022 // Protobuf
00023 class Protobuf : public lsf::basic::Singleton<Protobuf>, public lsf::basic::Error {
00024 public:
00026     // log handler
00027     static void ProtoBufLogHandler(google::protobuf::LogLevel level, char const* filename, int line, std::string const& message) {
00028         Protobuf::Instance()->LogHandle(level, filename, line, message);
00029     }
00030 
00031     void Init() { google::protobuf::SetLogHandler(ProtoBufLogHandler); }
00032 
00033     void LogHandle(google::protobuf::LogLevel level, char const* filename, int line, std::string const& message) {
00034         SetErrString("[[" + std::string(filename) + ":" + lsf::basic::TypeCast<std::string>(line) + "|" + message + "]]");
00035     }
00036 
00037 public:
00039     // message <--> binary string
00040     static inline bool SerializeProtoMsgToString(std::string& content, google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00041         return message.SerializeToString(&content);
00042     }
00043 
00044     static inline bool ParseProtoMsgFromString(std::string const& content, google::protobuf::Message& message) {
00045         return message.ParseFromString(content);
00046     }
00047 
00049     // message <--> text string
00050     static inline bool SerializeProtoMsgToTextFormatString(std::string& content, google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00051         return google::protobuf::TextFormat::PrintToString(message, &content);
00052     }
00053 
00054     static inline bool ParseProtoMsgFromTextFormatString(std::string const& content, google::protobuf::Message& message) {
00055         return google::protobuf::TextFormat::ParseFromString(content, &message);
00056     }
00057 
00058     static inline std::string MsgToTextFormatString(google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00059         std::string content;
00060         SerializeProtoMsgToTextFormatString(content, message);
00061         return content;
00062     }
00063 
00065     // message <--> bin file
00066     static inline bool SerializeProtoMsgToBinFile(std::string const& file, google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00067         // open file
00068         std::ofstream ofs(file, std::ios::out | std::ios::binary | std::ios::trunc);
00069         if (!ofs) return false;
00070 
00071         // serialize protobuf
00072         if (!message.SerializeToOstream(&ofs)) return false;
00073 
00074         return true;
00075     }
00076 
00077     static inline bool ParseProtoMsgFromBinFile(std::string const& file, google::protobuf::Message& message) {
00078         // open file
00079         std::ifstream ifs(file, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00080         if (!ifs) return false;
00081 
00082         // parse protobuf
00083         if (!message.ParseFromIstream(&ifs)) return false;
00084 
00085         return true;
00086     }
00087 
00089     // message <--> text file
00090     static inline bool SerializeProtoMsgToFile(std::string const& file, google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00091         // open file
00092         std::ofstream ofs(file, std::ios::out | std::ios::trunc);
00093         if (!ofs) return false;
00094 
00095         // serialize protobuf
00096         google::protobuf::io::OstreamOutputStream osos(&ofs);
00097         if (!google::protobuf::TextFormat::Print(message, &osos)) return false;
00098 
00099         return true;
00100     }
00101 
00102     static inline bool ParseProtoMsgFromFile(std::string const& file, google::protobuf::Message& message) {
00103         // open file
00104         std::ifstream ifs(file, std::ios::in);
00105         if (!ifs) return false;
00106 
00107         // parse protobuf
00108         google::protobuf::io::IstreamInputStream isis(&ifs);
00109         if (!google::protobuf::TextFormat::Parse(&isis, &message)) return false;
00110 
00111         return true;
00112     }
00113 
00115     // message <--> json
00116     static bool SerializeProtoMsgToJson(std::string& content, google::protobuf::Message const& message) {
00117         // // get descriptor and reflection
00118         // auto* pref = message.GetReflection();
00119         // auto* pdesc = message.GetDescriptor();
00120         //
00121         // // heading braclet
00122         // std::ostringstream oss;
00123         // oss << "{";
00124         //
00125         // // travers all field
00126         // for (int i = 0; i < pdesc->field_count(); ++i) {
00127         // }
00128         return true;
00129     }
00130 };
